works.complaint:
The user does not have expressed consent to publish
the  
content listed in the URL, privately or publicly and should (according to 

them by word) no longer have access to such information.

It is my understanding that the individual involved has relations with a  

Google employee and has used that connection to hijack an email account  
that I had used previously.

Furthermore, I also am lead to believe by their word that they have a  
service with Google that provides backup of their computer content that I 

would request be removed relating to the email address provided earlier  
along with related content to the profile.

If unable to fulfill these requests, I would appreciate being forwarded to
 
the relevant person(s) whom may be able to assist me.

Thank you.
